item.title: [PI] Empty command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

That’s the code i gave you lol, its c.getPA not c.getPH

[code]public void handleEmpty() {
c.getDH().sendOption2(“Yes, Empty my inventory please.”, “No, don’t empty my inventory.”);
c.dialogueAction = 850;
}

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“empty”)) {
c.getPA().handleEmpty();
}

case 9157:
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 850) {
c.getPA().removeAllItems();

case 9158:
if (c.dialogueAction == 850) {
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
return;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Empty command [PI]

item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

It will just give me an error and say The method removeAllItems() is undefined for the type PlayerAssistant I’m trying to execute the command in clickingbuttons.java because of a dialogue I made.

Code in clickingbuttons.java

case 2461: if (c.dialogueAction == 850) { c.getPA().removeAllItems(); }

Help please.
